description:
{{Nihongo|'''Saori Hayami'''|早見 沙織|Hayami Saori|born May 29, 1991}} is a Japanese [[Voice acting in Japan|voice actress]] and singer affiliated with [[I'm Enterprise]]. As a singer, she is signed to [[Warner Bros. Home Entertainment]]. Hayami won the [[10th Seiyu Awards]] for Best Supporting Actress.
{{TOC limit}}
